nostr.description: Configure your relay connections for optimal performance and network reach.
nostr.addRelayDescription: Enter a WebSocket URL to add a new Nostr relay to your configuration.
nostr.activeRelaysDescription: Manage your current relay connections. Connected relays are actively syncing data.
nostr.addFirstRelay: Add your first relay above to get started.
nostr.relayRemovedDescription: Relay has been removed from your list
nostr.invalidRelayUrl: Relay URL must start with wss:// or ws://
nostr.helpTextEnd: for more information about configuring relays.
